channel.title: Does anyone know how to take password encrypt with md5 and unknown salt
channel.description:
Hi I want to take the encrypt of so if any players forgets there password I can change is with easy insted of
[code]character-password = d6de7fc685676142d24c72e5efa3b9a1[/code]
I want it to say the real password eg.
[code]character-password = example[/code]
Does anyone know how I can take this "md5" and "unknown salt" off??

item.title: Does anyone know how to take password encrypt with md5 and unknown salt
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

Search hash in client.java, press enter 2 times, you’ll find something that looks like this String hashPW = md5(playerPass); playerPass = hashPW; Delete that, save, compile, should work, only downpart is you’ll have to change all the encrypted passwords to the passwords they use 2 logg in

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone know how to take password encrypt with md5 and unknown salt
